        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2662</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">convex mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">konvexe Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroirs convexes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelhos convexos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">specchi convessi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυρτοί καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">espejos convexos</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the position and magnification of an image formed by a conves mirror</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">phsyics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Position und die 
Vergrößerung eines Bildes zeigt, das durch einen conves Spiegel 
gebildet wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la position et le 
rapport optique d'une image constituée par un miroir de conves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a posição e a 
ampliação de uma imagem dada forma por um espelho dos conves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la posizione e 
l'ingrandimento di un'immagine costituita da uno specchio dei conves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη θέση και την 
ενίσχυση μιας εικόνας που διαμορφώνεται από έναν καθρέφτη 
conves</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la posición y la 
ampliación de una imagen formó por un espejo de los conves</string>
          </description>
